name: Tile room

exits.description: Oh no! You've run into a drop of water.  You are trapped.  The only way out is to solve this problem.
There's a wall in this direction.
There's a wall in this direction.
There's a wall in this direction.
There's a door in this direction, but it is closed shut.
There's a wall in this direction.
To the West is a room carpeted with an ugly orange shag.
There's a wall in this direction.
On the ceiling is a fan, which does not seem to have seen much action lately.
You look down and see your the room reflected in the tile.

description: The tile on the floor of this room shines with an otherworldly brightness.  It is sparkly clean.  There are doors to the West and South, but only the one to the West is open.
